attributes.action: Speak to the owners of a local Alsatian dog who is known to be aggressive
attributes.additional_details: It’s dangerous and it could end up with severe consequences- I.e dog attack. It’s not fair on the dog.
attributes.background: We shouldn’t be scared to walk past our roads, at night or in the day, this dog has been known to chase children and tore up a young girls coat.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. 
 
Decisions about local dogs are a matter for local wardens or the police, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You may wish to report the dog here:
https://www.gov.uk/control-dog-public/report-a-dog
